refnamediv.refpurpose: Fetch the next row of a result set as an object

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an object representing the fetched row, where each property represents the name of the result set's column, &null; if there are no more rows in the result set, &return.falseforfailure;.
